slogan: Jlice's online cafeteria, Chinese food recipe tutorial.
desc: At 12 midnight, the bell rang, and the time for a cafeteria in a corner of the city began. This is the recipe of Jlice's cafeteria. Only food and love can't live up to it.
info: Jlice's online cafeteria with classic Chinese recipes. Suitable for beginners, there are also advanced recipe tutorials.
